Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Restricts a registered sex offender from residing within 1000 feet of school grounds or a playground
Summary: Restricts a registered sex offender from residing within 1000 feet of school grounds or a playground.
LawCode: Amd §§168-c, 168-d, 168-f, 168-k, 168-n & 203, add §211, Cor L; amd §§259-c & 243, Exec L; amd §10.11, Ment Hyg L; amd §§10.00 & 65.10, Pen L; amd §20, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law, the mental hygiene law, the penal law and the social services law, in relation to the residence of a sex offender
